name: EventType
title: eventType
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying the trigger event for Version 2.x interface messages.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the MSH segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0003 (Event Type)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

Describes the event before specimen collection, when containers have been prepared
Describes the event when specimen collection was successful
Describes the event when specimen collection was not successful and provides a means to document the reason
Describes the event when a specimen has been moved from a location
Describes the event when a specimen has been moved to a location
Describes the event when a specimen has been accepted on the receiver side of a specimen movement
Describes the event when a specimen has been rejected by the receiver side of a specimen movement
Describes the event when a specimen has been assigned an identifier
Describes the event when a specimen identifier has been removed to anonymize it
Describes the event when a specimen has been moved into storage
Describes the event when a specimen has been moved out of storage
Describes the event when a specimen has been permanently disposed of

concept.display: Specimen Procedure Step Successful , with Derived Specimen(s)
concept.definition: Describes the event when one or more specimen(s) has(ve) been created from one or more specimen(s)

concept.display: Specimen Procedure Step Successful, no Derived Specimen(s)
concept.definition: Describes the event when a specimen has been successfully processed without producing any child specimen(s)
Describes the event when a specimen could not be successfully processed and provides a means to document the reason
